articles.title: At least 8 dead following crush at Cameroon's win in Africa Cup of Nations - ESPN India
articles.description: At least eight people have died in a crush outside a stadium hosting an Africa Cup of Nations soccer game in Cameroon, an official said Monday.
articles.content:
At least eight people died and 38 were injured in a crush outside a stadium hosting an Africa Cup of Nations soccer game in Cameroon, the government said in a statement on Tuesday.
